summary: Roland said of this sword that it\'s color changed thirty times a day. Now you can see for yourself ingame if the legend is true.
descriptionHtml:
Stats:
Equals the damage of a one hand dragonbone sword (15 base) but is 1 unit heavier (because Dragonbone is heavy but Gold is...you know...) and has 1.1 reach instead of 1 because it\\\'s 10% longer. Same Critical.

Unique, can not be crafted, but can be upgraded with 1 Steel and 1 Gold ingot and the Steel smith perk.

Textures files are to Bethesda downloadable High resolution texture pack specs (2048).

Location:



Notch felt like a king and was on top of the world with his new found fortune. But the friendly Dragon he met just a little bit earlier, turned deadly when he tried to retrieve her.

Installation: Extract file: Joyeuse.rar  and move/merge content in your Skyrim  \\\"Data\\\" Folder.
author: pete40
